price: Wọ́n di ẹni-ìṣẹ́bilé níbikíbi tí ọwọ́ bá ti bà wọ́n; wọ́n máa mú wọn, wọ́n sì máa pa wọ́n tààrà.
arabic: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِفُوٓاْ أُخِذُواْ وَقُتِّلُواْ تَقۡتِيلٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: malʿūnīna aynamā thuqifū ukhidhū waquttilū taqtīlan
